document.full_text: from an expertly tailored black silk jacket to a futuristic outfit, a retrospective at the metropolitan museum of art chronicles the extraordinary career of the late british fashion designer alexander mcqueen.
document.title: retrospective highlights alexander mcqueen's career
lines_and_colors: from an expertly tailored black silk jacket to a futuristic outfit, a retrospective at the metropolitan museum of art chronicles the extraordinary career of the late british fashion designer alexander mcqueen.
